name: The cloak of Kk'ras'hh <Ethereal>
data: It decreases the users strength poorly.
It decreases the users constitution poorly.
It increases the users wisdom impressively.
It increases the users intelligence poorly.
It has average armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration noticably.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'mastery of shielding'.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It affects the user's skill knowledge.
